item.title: An AI ‘house of cards’: Worries of a bubble grow after Oracle’s rally on OpenAI deal
item.description: OpenAI needs more than $300 billion in revenue to "justify" its level of spending, one analyst said.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts bet on the potential of these 3 stocks for the long haul
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks, including Broadcom and Oracle, that are favored by Wall Street.

item.title: AI monetization is spreading. UBS shares some of its favorite China plays
item.description: Several mainland companies have had a chance at monetizing generative AI in the past two years. Leaders and laggards are emerging.

item.title: Wall Street’s SPAC engine restarts as deal volume hits post-2021 high
item.description: So far this year, 89 SPACs have launched IPOs, the busiest pace since 2021, according to data from SPACInsider.

item.title: Tesla and Micron are overbought and could be due for a pullback with stock market at all-time high
item.description: The stock market's run to fresh all-time highs this week has left some individual names in overbought territory, putting them at risk of a pullback.
